remarks: There is no 4-cycle in a friendship graph, see Proposition 1(a) of [MertziosUnger] p. 153 :  "A friendship graph G contains no C4 as a subgraph ...".  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Nov-2017.)
statement: n4cyclfrgra $p |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ F ( V Cycles E ) P ) -> ( # ` F ) =/= 4 ) $.
